journey.title: Guided Compliance Journey
journey.description: Let our Agentic AI analyze your documents against the HRSD framework and generate a step-by-step compliance plan.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Guided Compliance Journey
welcome.description: This AI-powered agent will guide you through analyzing a policy, identifying compliance gaps against the HRSD framework, and creating an actionable plan to resolve them. The process involves selecting a policy, letting the AI perform its analysis, and then reviewing the generated compliance plan.

select.title: Step 1: Select a Policy to Analyze
select.description: Choose one of the generated policies below. The AI will compare its content against the official regulatory framework to check for compliance.

analyzing.description: Please wait while the agent compares the document for '{{policyTitle}}' with the HRSD framework to identify compliance gaps.

plan.title: Step 2: Review Compliance Plan
plan.description: The AI has analyzed the policy and generated the following action plan. Follow these steps to ensure your document is fully compliant.

error.title: Analysis Failed
error.description: The AI agent was unable to generate a compliance plan. This could be due to a network issue or a problem with the service. Please try again later.
